replies.body: There needs to be a different recall for each of the ranks !!

It would pre funny as a joke if Riot did that for April Fools or something. 

Where the challenger recall / feature announced is for bronzes or something.

Plus it's already possible to change/customize  your own recall 'look/colour' but it's only applicable to your account.

@RIOT RISCX, Will there be a challenger jacket reward for 2017? Because I think it is a good reward that really makes challenger players stand out. Most challenger players in every region are affiliated with some kind of income source for riot games, So money shouldn't be the reason why this reward is included or not. also lots of players put endless time into your game to achieve these high ranks, and it would show that you care about them with making the challenger jacket a permanent challenger reward.
